menu.name: 🌨Winter Note🌨
menu.description: In the winter we recommend to put the tika pika box for a few seconds in the microwave oven without opening the box🙏🏼

menu.name: Cutlet Tika Meal
menu.description: Breaded beef patty containing Indian spices, topped with tahini together with tomato & lettuce served fries and choice of soft drink. Tahini and spicy sauce, mint coriander chutney on the side

menu.name: Cutlet Tika
menu.description: Pan Grilled Patty with Indian spices. Topped with Tahini together with lettuce and Tomato. Tahini and spicy sauce, mint coriander chutney on the side

menu.name: Shaka Anda
menu.description:
2 poached eggs in a tomato Masala sauce served with 2 pitas
 ** No Changes **

menu.name: Kebab Tika Meal
menu.description:
Charcoal-grilled spiced minced meat on a skewer, topped with tahini together with tomato, lettuce, red onion, tahini, spicy sauce. served with mint coriander chutney on the side. 
Served with fries and a drink of your choice

menu.name: Keema Tika Meal
menu.description:
Ground beef & green peas tossed with herbs & spices, topped with tahini together with tomato, red onion & lettuce. Tahini, mint coriander chutney on the side.
Served with fries and a drink of your choice

menu.name: Chicken Tika Meal
menu.description:
Charcoal-grilled chunks of spiced marinated boneless chicken topped with tahini, in a stone-baked pita together with lettuce, red onion & tomato. Tahini, spicy sauce, mint coriander chutney on the side.
Served with fries and a drink of your choice

menu.name: Fish Tika Meal
menu.description:
Charcoal-grilled mildly spiced boneless fish topped with lemon garlic sauce together with lettuce, red onion & tomato, in a stone-baked pita. Tahini, Mint coriander chutney, spicy sauce on the side.
Served with fries and a drink of your choice

menu.name: Tofu Tika Meal
menu.description:
Tofu cubes coated with chickpea flour, carom seeds batter, topped with tomato chutney together with lettuce, red onion & tomato in a stone-baked pita. Tahini spicy sauce, mint coriander chutney on the side.
Served with fries and a drink of your choice

menu.name: Aloo Tika Meal
menu.description:
Crisp dumplings of diced potato cooked with mustard seeds dipped in chickpea flour batter, topped with tomato chutney together with lettuce red onion & tomato in a stone-baked pita. Tahini, spicy sauce, mint coriander chutney On the side. 
Served with fries and a drink of your choice

menu.name: ‫🌱Tika Sauce
menu.description: Our signature tangy tomato sauce packed with flavor brings the taste of India right into your pocket
